# binary.fable
<!-- badges: start -->

The R package *binary.fable* provides a collection of time series forecasting models suitable for binary time series. These models work within the fable framework, which provides the tools to evaluate, visualise, and combine models in a workflow consistent with the tidyverse.

## Installation

You can install the **development** version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/robjhyndman/binary.fable)

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("robjhyndman/binary.fable")
```
